Nigerian Referees Are Corrupt Benson Nigerian Referees Are Corrupt Benson

Nigerlan referees have been accused of possessing corrupt tendencies which Is hindering the development of football in the country. Nigerlan referees have been accused of possessing corrupt tendencies which Is hindering the development of football in the country.

Shooting Star defender Ghanaian John Benson made the accusation when he spoke to PMsport in an interview. Shooting Star defender Ghanaian John Benson made the accusation when he spoke to PMsport in an interview.

He said that the referees contributed in no small way to the fall in the standard of the Nigeria league system. He said that the referees contributed in no small way to the fall in the standard of the Nigeria league system.

Although football is high in Nigeria when compared with Ghana, the standard has also fallen tremendously as a result of the biased officiating of these referees. Gboko Still Bemoans Amodu Gboko Still Bemoans Amodu

The young, the middle-aged and the old, all hope and pray for the return of the 37 year old sweat merchant who made otherwise rus- tic Gboko a big, shiny diamond on the national map. The young, the middle-aged and the old, all hope and pray for the return of the 37 year old sweat merchant who made otherwise rus- tic Gboko a big, shiny diamond on the national map.

"He must surely come back", said a football fanatic as the town joined the whole world to cel- ebrate christmas, the occasion of the birth of Jesus Christ, at the weekend. "Jesus we remember to- day as the saviour of Christians, who came to make the world a better place to live in for his people. In Gboko, we equally remember Amodu as the saviour of our foot- ball, who made Gboko a 'den' to be feared by all other football teams in the land". He was serious about it.
